ValidationRule.description: Work Order must have the scheduled date and time entered to select In Progress
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( OR ( ISPICKVAL(WO_Status__c , "In Progress"), ISPICKVAL(WO_Status__c , "Scheduled")), ISBLANK (Schedule_Date__c ), ISBLANK ( Scheduled_Time__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You Must enter a scheduled date above and time below in order to select status of In Progress or Scheduled
